channel.title: Discover how I changed my life with yoga
channel.description: Discover how I changed my life with yoga

item.title: My Yoga Lessons
item.description:
My Yoga Lessons

I teach to all levels.

item.title: I'm a Yogini
item.description:
I'm a Yogini

I was born in Bolivia but at the age of 9 my parents moved to Belgium.  As a child I loved to dance. Movement was everything for me. Drawn to the magic of storytelling I did my master in Cinematography in RITS and soon after my graduation I started to work as a Television Director. Long hours and lot's of stress where very common on my job but I loved it because I was always working with different people, different places and alwasy telling story's. My love for yoga started in 2004. I first started with Bikram Yoga because I loved the challenge in the hot studio.And the routine was very handy to empty my head. After some years loving that I wanted to become more peacefull and started practicing Hatha Yoga. But for me that wasn’t challenging enough so there came the dancer in me again and I fell in love with Vinyasa Flow.

item.title: Happy to see you here! Yoga is the unity of body and soul... I like to bind this by heart.
item.description:
Happy to see you here! Yoga is the unity of body and soul... I like to bind this by heart.

Yoga is the unity of body and soul... I like to bind this by heart.
